title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Grand Theft Auto V is an open-world action-adventure video game developed and published by Rockstar Games. It was released in September 2013 for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360, in November 2014 for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One, and in April 2015 for Windows PC.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is an action role-playing video game developed and published by CD Projekt Red. It is the sequel to The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings and the final installment in the trilogy based on the Witcher novels by Andrzej Sapkowski.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an action-adventure game set in the wild west. It is the prequel to 2010's Red Dead Redemption and was developed and published by Rockstar Games.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: An open-world action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch console.

title: Super Mario Odyssey
description: A 3D platformer game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch console.

title: Hollow Knight
description: A metroidvania action-adventure game developed and published by Team Cherry.

title: Hades
description: An action dungeon crawler roguelike video game developed and published by Supergiant Games.

title: Stardew Valley
description: An open-ended farming simulator video game developed by ConcernedApe.

title: Cuphead
description: A run-and-gun video game developed by Studio MDHR. Inspired by 1930s cartoons, the game uses a side-scrolling shoot 'em up style.

title: Disco Elysium
description: An open world role-playing game developed and published by ZA/UM. It is a role-playing game with isometric perspective and point-and-click interface.

title: Celeste
description: A 2D platformer video game developed by Matt Makes Games. Players control Madeline, a young woman with anxiety, as she attempts to climb Celeste Mountain.

title: Portal 2
description: A first-person puzzle-platform video game developed and published by Valve. It is the sequel to the 2007 video game Portal.

title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: An action role-playing video game developed by Bethesda Game Studios and published by Bethesda Softworks. It is the fifth installment in the Elder Scrolls series.

title: Minecraft
description: A sandbox video game developed by Mojang Studios. Players in Minecraft can build with various types of blocks in a three-dimensional world.

title: Undertale
description: A role-playing game created by Toby Fox. Players control a human child who has fallen underground into the world of monsters.

title: Outer Wilds
description: An exploration adventure game developed by Mobius Digital and published by Annapurna Interactive. Players control an astronaut who explores a solar system trapped in a 22-minute time loop.

title: Elden Ring
description: An action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.

title: Stray
description: An adventure game developed by BlueTwelve Studio and published by Annapurna Interactive. Players control a stray cat exploring a walled city filled with robots.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description: The sequel to 2017's The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, developed and published by Nintendo.

title: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
description: An open-world stealth action-adventure video game developed by Kojima Productions and published by Konami.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Blood and Wine
description: The second and final expansion pack for the action role-playing video game The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, developed and published by CD Projekt Red.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2: Online
description: An online multiplayer action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games. It is a part of Red Dead Redemption 2, set in the wild west.

title: Monster Hunter: World
description: An action role-playing game developed and published by Capcom. Players take on the role of a hunter who hunts monsters in a large, open world.

title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: An action-adventure game developed by FromSoftware and published by Activision. Players control a shinobi who seeks revenge on a samurai clan.

title: The Last Guardian
description: A boy befriends a mythical creature and embarks on a journey to unravel ancient mysteries.

title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
description: A young girl named Amicia and her younger brother Hugo fight their way through war-torn France in the midst of the Black Death.

title: Firewatch
description: Henry, a fire lookout stationed in the Wyoming wilderness, uncovers a mystery while communicating with his supervisor over a walkie-talkie.

title: Gris
description: A young woman named Gris journeys through a world devoid of color to deal with her emotional pain and rediscover her joy in life.

title: Inside
description: A boy in a dystopian world navigates a series of perilous environments, solving puzzles and avoiding dangers.

title: What Remains of Edith Finch
description: Edith Finch explores her family's history by investigating their mysterious deaths through interactive stories.

title: Super Metroid
description: Samus Aran returns to planet Zebes to hunt down Ridley and retrieve a stolen Metroid larva, facing new enemies and acquiring powerful upgrades.

title: NieR: Automata
description: 2B, a combat android, and 9S, a scanner android, fight machine lifeforms in a post-apocalyptic world while uncovering the truth about their existence.

title: Dark Souls III
description: Dark Souls III is the third installment in the challenging action RPG series known for its intense combat, intricate level design, and atmospheric world.

title: Mass Effect 2
description: Mass Effect 2 is a sci-fi RPG that follows Commander Shepard as they assemble a diverse team to save the galaxy. The game is praised for its compelling narrative and character development.

title: Bioshock Infinite
description: Set in the sky-bound city of Columbia, Bioshock Infinite combines intense FPS gameplay with a thought-provoking narrative, exploring themes of identity and choice.

title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion
description: Oblivion is an expansive open-world RPG, offering a vast fantasy realm to explore, filled with quests, dungeons, and a rich lore.

title: Divinity: Original Sin 2
description: Divinity: Original Sin 2 is a critically acclaimed RPG with deep storytelling, strategic turn-based combat, and a highly interactive world.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time is a classic action-adventure game that follows Link's quest to stop the evil Ganondorf. It is highly acclaimed for its revolutionary 3D gameplay and immersive world.

title: Fallout: New Vegas
description: Fallout: New Vegas is an action RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world. With branching storylines and a vast open-world, players navigate the Mojave Wasteland in search of their character's past.

title: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey
description: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey takes players to ancient Greece, offering a vast open-world to explore. With choice-driven narratives and intense combat, it's a standout in the Assassin's Creed series.

title: Half-Life 2
description: Half-Life 2 is a groundbreaking first-person shooter known for its immersive storytelling, advanced physics, and innovative gameplay mechanics. It continues the story of Gordon Freeman as he battles the Combine forces.

title: The Last of Us Part II
description: The Last of Us Part II is an emotionally charged action-adventure game that follows Ellie's journey in a post-apocalyptic world. With a gripping narrative and intense gameplay, it received widespread acclaim.

title: Persona 5
description: Persona 5 is a stylish role-playing game where players take on the role of a high school student who moonlights as a Phantom Thief. With a mix of dungeon exploration, social simulation, and turn-based combat, it has gained widespread acclaim.

title: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings
description: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings is the second installment in the Witcher series, offering a dark fantasy world and a mature, branching narrative. Players control Geralt of Rivia as he navigates political intrigue and monster hunting.

title: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
description: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End is an action-adventure game that follows Nathan Drake on his final adventure. Known for its stunning visuals, cinematic storytelling, and exhilarating set-pieces.

title: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
description: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order is an action-adventure game set in the Star Wars universe. Players control Cal Kestis, a young Jedi Padawan, as he navigates a galaxy under the grip of the Empire.

title: Minecraft: Java Edition
description: Minecraft is a sandbox game that allows players to build and explore virtual worlds made up of blocks. With limitless creativity and survival challenges, it has become a cultural phenomenon.

title: Splatoon 2
description: Splatoon 2 is a colorful third-person shooter where players control squid-like characters, engaging in vibrant and fast-paced multiplayer battles. The game is known for its unique gameplay and family-friendly design.

title: Yoshi's Crafted World
description: Yoshi's Crafted World is a delightful platformer where players guide Yoshi through a world made of everyday objects. The game features charming visuals, creative level design, and cooperative multiplayer.

title: Kirby Star Allies
description: Kirby Star Allies is a platformer that follows the adorable pink puffball, Kirby, as he befriends enemies to create a team. The game features cooperative multiplayer and a charming art style.

title: LittleBigPlanet 3
description: LittleBigPlanet 3 is a puzzle-platformer that allows players to create, share, and play user-generated levels. It emphasizes creativity, cooperative gameplay, and a charming narrative.

title: Luigi's Mansion 3
description: Luigi's Mansion 3 is an action-adventure game where Luigi must rescue his friends from the haunted Last Resort hotel. The game combines humor, puzzles, and exploration in a kid-friendly setting.

title: Overwatch
description: Overwatch is a team-based first-person shooter with a diverse cast of heroes, each with unique abilities. Known for its fast-paced gameplay and emphasis on teamwork, it has gained popularity in the competitive gaming scene.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
description: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask is an action-adventure game known for its unique time-based mechanics. Link must save the world of Termina within a three-day cycle, adding an element of urgency to the gameplay.

title: Rocket League
description: Rocket League is a unique sports game that combines soccer with rocket-powered cars. Players control customizable vehicles and aim to score goals in a fast-paced and highly entertaining multiplayer environment.

title: Civilization VI
description: Sid Meier's Civilization VI is a turn-based strategy game that challenges players to build and lead their own civilization from ancient times to the modern era. It features complex gameplay and strategic depth.

title: Doom Eternal
description: Doom Eternal is an intense first-person shooter that continues the iconic Doom series. Players battle against demonic forces with powerful weapons and engage in fast-paced, adrenaline-pumping combat.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: Horizon Zero Dawn is an action RPG set in a lush, post-apocalyptic world where robotic creatures roam. Players control Aloy, a skilled hunter, as she unravels the mysteries of her world.

title: Cities: Skylines
description: Cities: Skylines is a city-building simulation game where players can construct and manage their own city. It offers expansive city planning and customization options, making it a favorite among simulation enthusiasts.

title: Monster Hunter: Rise
description: Monster Hunter: Rise is an action RPG that lets players embark on epic hunts to defeat formidable monsters. With cooperative multiplayer, dynamic environments, and a variety of weapons, it's a thrilling experience for fans of the series.

title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
description: Ori and the Will of the Wisps is a visually stunning metroidvania game. Players control Ori, a guardian spirit, as they navigate through a beautifully crafted world, solving puzzles and battling enemies.

title: Fire Emblem: Three Houses
description: Fire Emblem: Three Houses is a tactical RPG with deep storytelling and strategic battles. Players take on the role of a professor at a military academy, shaping the destinies of their students.

title: Hollow Knight: Silksong
description: Hollow Knight: Silksong is the highly anticipated sequel to Hollow Knight. Players control Hornet, a princess-protector, as she embarks on a journey through a new kingdom filled with challenging enemies and mysteries.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is a futuristic open-world action RPG set in the dystopian Night City. Players assume the role of V, a mercenary, as they navigate a cyber-enhanced world filled with complex characters and choices.

title: Astral Chain
description: Astral Chain is an action game set in a vibrant, futuristic city. Players control a special task force officer with a sentient weapon, battling otherworldly creatures and solving cases to maintain peace.

title: Slay the Spire
description: Slay the Spire is a deck-building rogue-like game where players ascend a spire, encountering various challenges and enemies. The game's dynamic card-based combat and strategic choices make each run unique.

title: Subnautica
description: Subnautica is an underwater survival adventure game. Players explore a vast ocean, gather resources, and construct underwater habitats while uncovering the mysteries of an alien planet.

title: Control
description: Control is an action-adventure game with a supernatural twist. Players assume the role of Jesse Faden, the new director of the Federal Bureau of Control, as she uncovers mysteries within the mysterious Oldest House.

title: The Outer Worlds
description: The Outer Worlds is an action RPG set in an alternate future where mega-corporations control space colonies. Players navigate a branching narrative and make choices that impact the game world.

title: No Man's Sky
description: No Man's Sky is an expansive action-adventure and survival game set in a procedurally generated universe. Players explore planets, trade, and engage in space exploration with the goal of reaching the center of the galaxy.

title: NieR Replicant ver.1.22474487139...
description: NieR Replicant ver.1.22474487139... is an action RPG that serves as an updated version of the original NieR Replicant. Players embark on an emotional journey exploring a post-apocalyptic world.

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an action RPG set in the Viking Age. Players take on the role of Eivor, a Viking raider, as they lead their clan to settle in England and engage in intense battles and political intrigue.

title: Ghost of Tsushima
description: Ghost of Tsushima is an action-adventure game set in feudal Japan. Players control Jin Sakai, a samurai, as he adapts unconventional tactics to protect Tsushima Island from the Mongol invasion.

title: Rainbow Six Siege
description: Rainbow Six Siege is a tactical shooter that focuses on team-based strategy and destructible environments. Players engage in intense close-quarters combat as part of elite counter-terrorism units.

title: Death Stranding
description: Death Stranding is an action game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players control Sam Bridges, a courier, as he navigates a fractured society and connects isolated communities.

title: Mortal Kombat 11
description: Mortal Kombat 11 is a fighting game with a deep roster of characters and brutal finishing moves. Players engage in one-on-one combat, and the game features a compelling story mode.
